sentence.Network_en: The inverted nine - spot rhombus pattern has two adjustable directions of well array.
sentence.Network_cn: 菱形反九点井网有两个可调的井排方向,是适合于裂缝和砂体方向性明显油藏的最佳井网.

sentence.Network_en: McGregor's effort was enough to edge Johnson out of the top spot.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦格雷戈奋力一搏，成功地将约翰逊从第一的位置上挤了下来。

sentence.Network_en: Seventy-nine voted in the affirmative, and none in the negative.
sentence.Network_cn: 79人投赞成票，没有人投反对票。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Adjusted the well pattern from inverted nine-spot to five-spot will improve the oil production and recovery.将反九点井网调整为五点井网可以提高油田开发效果;。

inverted nine - spot injection pattern ., 反九点注水井网.
